title: So does Key fragments drop if you own 0 chests ?
body: let's say you already opened all your 4 chests for this month are there chances for other fragments to drop after that ?

replies.body: Yep! However, keep in mind that the drop chance isn't linear so you'll earn them faster in earlier wins than later wins.  For more context, check out [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/rJ4rQmHA-after-getting-4-chests-key-fragments-no-longer-seem-to-drop-for-a-lot-of-people)

I think more specifically, it is that your chance to find a key fragment goes down each time you find a key fragment, on a chance that resets each month. Saying "faster in earlier wins rather than later" gives the impression that the chance to get a key goes down with every win even if you're not earning keys.
To my knowledge, that is correct :D

Actually I was going to say it gave the impression that ending games quicker gives you a better drop rate. (Which is obviously not true)

Technically, this is actually true. Faster game completion = More games per hour = more drop chances per hour = more key fragments per hour. It doesn't increase the drop rate per game, but it increases the keys earned per minute.

"faster" earlier is kinda exessive,solo or duo getting only the second fragment take a hell of a time, when in 4/5 premade it's quick.

this extreme difference in drop rate will just push player to premade with complete strange (the hextech room already exist) leading to also an easy way to s grade chest (there is always an s in a win if not early surrend)

the key drop rate just kill the fun (personnaly, I would prefer a linear drop rate like, one fragment every 10 win or one key every 25)

I'm concerned about the tuning of that...I haven't gotten a single key fragment in two weeks now.  I don't play constantly or anything, but it's discouraging to be sitting on two chests (three tonight with any luck) with squat for keys...
